posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Once again in the land of unusual creations, this dwarven warrior-assassin will launch his attacks from stealth and dispatch his enemies quickly. His weapons, are a two-handed axe and his natural 30 strength that compined with EWS. IKD, UMD shenanigans & 9d6 Death attack will send his foes to the afterlife before they even realize what happened. His death attack DC isn't very high (although it is decent to say the least) but you have to remember this is an extra, play him as a warrior that can stealth and do alpha strikes - not an assassin that can fight like an warrior. This dwarven lad is meant to fight all the time wearing his full plate armour and i made sure that he has more than adequate stealth skills to do that properly. As far as defences are concerned he has warrior-like hp's and a moderate ammount of damage reduction to further help him, expertise and dwarven stance are likewise in his disposal and due to his dwarven awareness he is immune to sneaks as long as he is attacking someone.

There is one and only other assassin with this class combination, the Iron Blood Assassin by Xylophone but with his effective 36 AB he is not a contender.

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
A Strength based assassin with DR, something different indeed!
Stealth makes sense with ESF and a modified rank of 57, since your ACP is only -8. AB +43 is all right for a warrior, and very good when attacking flat footed creatures from stealth or invisibility. The DA DC is not among the best, but this warrior has so much going for him that it doesn't really matter that much.

posts.content: The Grandfather of Assassins approves, what better praise i could ask for?

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
An assassin in heavy plate wielding a greataxe. Been to two World Fairs, a rodeo and climbed a pyramid in Peru. This one takes the cake, Valerfor.

A few questions/comments...

Too bad you need to spend two feats just to compensate for the heavy plate.  I'd be interested to find out how the darkness works out because every attack will be a DA while inside the effect.  I wonder how many fort saves will be triggered inside.   Might work better with a bow, though. Be even better if it could be extended. Coming out of invis or stealth gives one shot and then combat is engaged.

With 4 more ranks in UMD (i.e. 36 (34) ), you'll be able to cast all Level 9 scrolls without failure.  Steal 4 from Search since your toon still must wait for the OnHeartbeat event to cycle through anyway.  Consume a Fox potion or 2 before venturing if you are overly concerned about trap spotting.
